text: Zumiez is an American multinational specialty clothing retailer, founded by Thomas Campion and Gary Haakenson in 1978. It has been publicly traded since 2005. It is a specialty business of apparel, footwear, accessories, hardgoods and skateboarding for young men and women. It is based in Lynnwood, Washington. Category:American clothing companies Category:Companies based in Washington (state) Category:1978 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Washington (state)
title: Zumiez
